definitions.text: (often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
examples: he made a mint on the stock market
see the rest of the winners in our huge passel of photos

definitions.text: a British imperial capacity measure (liquid or dry) equal to 2 gallons
a United States dry measure equal to 8 quarts or 537.605 cubic inches
hit lightly with a picking motion
eat by pecking at, like a bird

examples: The anorexic girl just picks at her food
She nags her husband all day long
